mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rental( rental_num, mem_num, scr_num, rental_per, rental_content, rental_name, rental_phone, rental_email, rental_date) VALUES ( rental_seq.nextval, #{mem_num}, #{scr_num}, #{rental_per}, #{rental_content}, #{rental_name}, #{rental_phone}, #{rental_email}, #{rental_date})

where.if: AND rental_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR rental_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rental JOIN member USING (mem_num)
SELECT * FROM rental JOIN member USING(mem_num) LEFT OUTER JOIN member_detail USING(mem_num) WHERE rental_num=#{rental_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE rental SET scr_num=#{scr_num}, rental_modifydate=SYSDATE, rental_per=#{rental_per}, rental_content=#{rental_content}, rental_name=#{rental_name}, rental_phone=#{rental_phone}, rental_email=#{rental_email}, rental_date=#{rental_date} WHERE rental_num=#{rental_num}
